message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $120.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I really appreciate you considering me. However, $120 is a bit more than I'm willing to spend right now.  Would you be open to $90 for this product?
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?

Alice, I understand you're firm on your price.  While I'm very interested, $110 is still a bit out of my budget.  I'm willing to pay $100 for this product, which is what I'd need to go ahead with the purchase. Would you be open to that?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I can see you're really interested in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $110 and $100, so I'm thinking of $105. Would you be willing to go up to that price?
